report.title: Remote Download using spatial index builder
report.description: Report suitable for downloading data into remote systems, such as via Indicia2Recorder.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences o JOIN occurrences occ on occ.id=o.id AND occ.deleted=false JOIN samples s on s.id=o.sample_id AND s.deleted=false JOIN users u ON u.id=o.created_by_id JOIN people p ON p.id=u.person_id #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND o.record_status not in ('I','T') AND (#ownData#=1 OR o.record_status not in ('D','R')) AND (#ownData#=0 OR CAST(o.created_by_id AS character varying)='#currentUser#') #idlist#

param.name: date_from
param.description: Filter by record added or updated date
param.where: ('#date_from#'='Click here' OR o.cache_updated_on >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date))

param.name: date_to
param.description: Filter by record added or updated date
param.where: ('#date_to#'='Click here' OR o.cache_updated_on <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date))

param.name: quality
param.description: Quality level required of data to be included in the map.
param.lookup_values: V:Data must be verified,C:Data must be verified or certain,L:Data must be at least likely,!D:Include anything not dubious or rejected,!R:Include anything not rejected

modifiers.where: o.certainty IS NOT NULL AND o.certainty='C' AND o.record_status NOT IN ('D','R')
(o.certainty in ('C', 'L') OR (o.certainty IS NULL)) AND o.record_status NOT IN ('D','R'))

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include as columns in the report

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include as columns in the report

param.name: idlist
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence IDs to filter to.

param.name: currentUser
param.description: Current user's warehouse ID. Allows a column to be output indicating that the user owns the record.

param.name: location_id
param.description: Provide the location to display records for

param.name: ownLocality
param.join: JOIN index_locations_samples lfilter ON lfilter.sample_id=o.sample_id and lfilter.location_id=#location_id#

param.name: taxon_groups
param.description: List of taxon group IDs to view data for

param.name: ownGroups
param.join: JOIN taxon_groups tgfilter ON tgfilter.id=o.taxon_group_id AND tgfilter.id IN (#taxon_groups#)

param.name: surveys
param.description: List of survey IDs to view data for

param.name: ownSurveys
param.join: JOIN surveys su ON su.id=o.survey_id AND su.id IN (#surveys#)

column.name: sample_id
column.sql: case when o.sensitivity_precision is null then o.sample_id else null end

column.name: location_name
column.sql: case when o.sensitivity_precision is null and o.privacy_precision is null then o.location_name else 'Sensitive. Lat long is approximate.' end

column.name: entered_sref
column.sql: case s.entered_sref_system when '4326' then o.public_entered_sref else replace(o.public_entered_sref, ' ', '') end

column.name: projection
column.sql: case s.entered_sref_system when '4326' then 'WGS84' when '27700' then 'OSGB36' else upper(s.entered_sref_system) end

column.name: precision
column.sql: case s.entered_sref_system when '4326' then 50 when '27700' then 1 else case length(replace(s.entered_sref, ' ', '')) when 5 then 2000 else pow(10, (12-length(replace(s.entered_sref, ' ', '')))/2) end end

column.name: recorder
column.sql: CASE WHEN o.website_id IN (#website_ids#) THEN '' ELSE o.website_title || '->' END || o.recorders

column.name: determiner
column.sql: CASE WHEN o.attr_det_full_name IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN o.attr_det_last_name IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE o.attr_det_last_name || COALESCE(', ' || o.attr_det_first_name, '') END ELSE o.attr_det_full_name END

column.name: record_status
column.sql: CASE o.record_status WHEN 'V' THEN 'Verified' WHEN 'D' THEN 'Queried' WHEN 'R' THEN 'Rejected' WHEN 'I' THEN 'Input still in progress' WHEN 'C' THEN 'Record Submitted' WHEN 'S' THEN 'Awaiting check' ELSE o.record_status END

column.name: belongs_to_user
column.sql: CASE CAST(o.created_by_id AS character varying) WHEN '#currentUser#' THEN true ELSE false END

column.name: certainty
column.sql: CASE o.certainty WHEN 'C' THEN 'Certain' WHEN 'L' THEN 'Likely' WHEN 'U' THEN 'Uncertain' END

column.name: recorder_person_id
column.sql: case when o.recorders = p.surname || ', ' || p.first_name or o.recorders = p.first_name || ' ' || p.surname or recorders = 'me' or recorders = 'myself' then cast(p.id as varchar(20)) else 'unknown' end

column.name: determiner_person_id
column.sql: case when o.recorders = o.attr_det_last_name || ', ' || o.attr_det_first_name or o.recorders = o.attr_det_first_name || ' ' || o.attr_det_last_name or o.recorders = o.attr_det_full_name then cast(p.id as varchar(20)) else 'unknown' end
